data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Davao del Norte, Philippines a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Davao del Norte, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Davao del Norte, Philippines know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Davao del Norte, Philippines.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Davao del Norte, Philippines.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, help the 141,582 believers in Davao del Norte to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 874,818 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Palawano, Brooke's Point people.
Father, help your children in Davao del Norte, Philippines find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Davao del Norte to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,016,400 people living in the state of Davao del Norte.
